import React from "react"; import "./Dashboard.css"; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { label: "Total Notices", value: "24", icon: "üì¢", color: "#4A90E2" }, { label: "Active Services", value: "12", icon: "üõ†Ô∏è", color: "#5CB85C" }, { label: "Schemes", value: "8", icon: "üìã", color: "#9B59B6" }, { label: "Complaints", value: "15", icon: "üìù", color: "#F39C12" }, ]; const recentActivities = [ { action: "New notice added", time: "2 hours ago", type: "notice" }, { action: "Complaint resolved", time: "5 hours ago", type: "complaint" }, { action: "Gallery updated", time: "1 day ago", type: "gallery" }, { action: "Service updated", time: "2 days ago", type: "service" }, ]; const getGreeting = () => { const hour = new Date().getHours(); if (hour < 12) return "Good Morning"; if (hour < 18) return "Good Afternoon"; return "Good Evening"; }; return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

{getGreeting()}, Administrator! üëã

Welcome back to your Gram Panchayat Admin Dashboard. Here's what's happening today.

))}

); }; export default Dashboard;
